name: Konami Collector's Series: Arcade Advanced
description: Konami Collector's Series: Arcade Advanced, released in Japan as Konami Arcade Game Collection (コナミアーケードゲームコレクション), and in Europe as Konami Collector's Series: Arcade Classics, is a compilation video game created by Konami. It was first released on March 22, 2002 for the Game Boy Advance. A version was also released as a plug & play by Majesco Entertainment.
